meanings.definition: To spray again with paint or another substance.
meanings.sent1: He resprays his bike every year to keep it looking new.
meanings.sent2: The painter resprays the walls to cover up any imperfections.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally resprays the canvas, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: She resprays her hair with glitter, turning heads wherever she goes.
meanings.sent5: The gardener resprays the plants, making them shine under the sun.

meanings.definition: The act of spraying something again with paint or another substance.
meanings.sent1: The resprays on the car made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: After the resprays, the furniture had a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: The resprays on the wall were so vibrant, they brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: The resprays on the statue brought out its intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The resprays on the fence protected it from rust and decay.
